articles.description: Ajay Sharma has edited Bollywood films like Ludo, Jagga Jasoos, Karwaan, Indoo Ki Jawani, Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2, Tum Mile and Rashmi Rocket, apart from web show Bandish Bandits. He died due to Covid-19 complications.
articles.content:
Bollywood film editor Ajay Sharma passed away due to Covid-19 complications on Tuesday night. He was in his late 30s. Sharma’s family sources confirmed the news with indianexpress.com.
